body: hi Guys. i had a go with very simple surrounding and it kind of worked, but once i tested with a project the result seems wrong cas my max height is at 450M and the "Separate by Normal" had issue. there should be a result of 2 srfs with solar envelope & collection. [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/00SS2erZpW3wZ90xQKP3BDO3s*0E432mGKEVPdDj3GDC0j3oszpcJrCeYTInS5eVciLmuj0p8UDWXF2N78dVV95eZbNBLQdL/17052201.JPG)
